meanings.definition: Fellow members of a male religious group.
meanings.sent1: The brethren gathered in the chapel for their evening prayers.
meanings.sent2: The brethren of the monastery worked together in harmony.
meanings.sent3: The brethren joked about who had the loudest snore during their retreat.
meanings.sent4: The brethren stood united like a band of brothers in their faith.
meanings.sent5: The brethren's bond was as strong as the stone walls of their ancient abbey.

meanings.definition: Members of the same family or group.
meanings.sent1: My brethren and I always celebrate holidays together.
meanings.sent2: The brethren of the neighborhood watch kept a vigilant eye on the streets.
meanings.sent3: The brethren shared a love for spicy food and often had chili cook-offs.
meanings.sent4: The brethren's support for each other was a fortress against any adversity.
meanings.sent5: The brethren's laughter echoed through the halls of their ancestral home.
